name: World Transform Info

inputs.name: Transform
inputs.description: The Transform component you want to get its world transform information

outputs.name: World Position
outputs.description: The world position of the Transform component

outputs.name: World Rotation
outputs.description: The world rotation of the Transform component

outputs.name: World Scale
outputs.description: The world scale of the Transform component

outputs.name: Up Dir
outputs.description: The world Y axis direction (green arrow) of the Transform component

outputs.name: Right Dir
outputs.description: The world X axis direction (red arrow) of the Transform component

outputs.name: Forward Dir
outputs.description: The world Z axis direction (blue arrow) of the Transform component

description: Get the world space position, rotation, and scale of a Transform component.
